long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URL Snapper is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to quickly save and manage your favorite URLs with just a click. This extension provides a convenient way to save and access your frequently visited websites, making your browsing experience more efficient and organized.

Features:

Save URLs with a single click using the "Snap" button.
View and manage your saved URLs in a clean and modern interface.
Click on a saved URL to open it in a new tab.
Easily delete individual URLs or clear all saved URLs with the "Delete" and "Delete All" buttons.
Copy any saved URL to your clipboard with the "Copy" button.
